alert.note: Alert for Thomas (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 7:40PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Jefferson, central Madison, southeastern Thomas and southwestern Brooks Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 740 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles west of Madison, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Madison, Greenville, Dills, Grooverville, Moseley Hall, Ebb, Lamont, Hopewell, Aucilla, Cherry Lake, Hamburg, Lovett, Nankin, Empress, Ashville and Sirmans. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
